name: Soul Dorado
description:
STORY

It is the story after the death of a treasure hunter who he has traveled all his life to hunt for treasure, but there is one thing that he can't find, which is "El Dorado, the Golden City" that during his lifetime. had never been able to find it in his life.It became something that he became stuck in his life until it became his dream, causing it to follow him until his end.After he died, he met the leader of the spirit. He asked the leader.“Where is El Dorado?” The guide pointed towards the Valley of Shadows.This place was the place where the soul was released. He traveled to the Valley of Shadows to begin his final adventure.

HOW TO CONTROL

This happens only when using the W key.

To go down use the S key.

Walk left using the A key.

Right use D key

To attack with a knife weapon, use the left click button.

Attack with a weapon, right click and hold.

Dash using the Spacebar key

Run using the Shift key

Please help us by rating this game. Tell us what you think!
